p: The RVFV risk-ranking of animal markets varied between 5 and 16 (out of a maximum of 20), with a mean value of 7.9. The markets with the highest scores were mainly located in the area between Cairo and Alexandria, to the north of Asyut and in the proximity of Aswan ( Fig 5). The two markets with the highest score were Birqash market (northwest of Cairo) and Daraw market (north of Aswan).
